passive.description: Dealing damage inflicts [Bleed], dealing [Damage Rate: 30%] Physical Damage every second for 8s, stacking up to6 times (stacks do not boost damage).At max stacks, triggers Hemorrhage, dealing  [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage + True Damage equal to 4%of the target's current HP and removes all [Bleed] stacks.Basic Attack Damage Bonuses affect the base damageand basic attack critical hits can cause the damage tocrit.

basicAttacks.description: [Basic Attack]:Deals [Damage Rate: 100%] PhysicalDamage and applies 1 stack of [Bleed]. Can cast [Bleeding Thrust] every 6s.Dash toward an enemy target, dealing [Damage Rate: 160%] Physical Damage and inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed]

[Basic Attack]:Deals [Damage Rate: 100%] PhysicalDamage and applies 1 stack of [Bleed]. Can cast [Ricochet] every 6s.Throws a blade at the target that deals [Damage Rate: 120%] Physical Damage, inflicts 1 stack of [Bleed], andreduces their Movement Speed by 40% for 2s. After whichit bounces to 1 enemy behind up to 4 times

Can cast [Armor Breaker] every 5s. Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies, inflicting 1 stack of [Bleed], and reducing their Armor by 10 for 4s. [Bleed]: Deals [Damage Rate: 30%] Physical Damage per second for 8s, stacking up to 6 times.

commonSkills.description: Throws 3 blades forward. Each blade deals  [Damage Rate: 80%] Physical Damage to all enemies hit. Uponreaching max range, the blades return, dealing  [Damage Rate: 80%] Physical Damage to those hit and inflicting 1stack of [Bleed]Multiple blade hits on the same target beyond the firstdeal 30% reduced damage

Dashes 3m backward while firing a Phase Blade forwardthat deals [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage to thefirst enemy hit, inflicting 1 stack of [Bleed] and Stunningfor 0.75s, while also marking them for 5s.Recast the skill within 15m while a mark exists toinstantly appear behind the target, dealing [Damage Rate: 160%] Physical Damage and gaining +30% Attack Speedfor 5s
Strike an enemy twice, dealing [Damage Rate: 180%]Physical Damage, applying 1 stack of [Bleed] andDisarming them for 4s. Increases Basic Attack Damage by25% for 5s.
Throws a smoke grenade to create a smoke screen for 6s.Enemies inside are Slowed by 40% and have a 55% chanceto miss Basic Attacks. Also deals [Damage Rate: 25%]Physical Damage every second

Instantly removes control effects and enters Stealth.While in Stealth, gains immunity to movement-limitingeffects (Slow, Immobilize) for 2s. Also increases damageby 7% for 6s, stacking up to 2 times.Can be recast once within 6s, but doing so will not removecontrol effects again.Using a skill, dealing damage or inflicting healing breaksStealth

skills.description: Leaps to the target and strikes, dealing [Damage Rate: 220%] Physical Damage and applying 2 stacks of [Bleed].Recovers [Healing Rate: 132%] HP.Gains 1 charge every 20s, up to 2 charges

Teleports toward the target direction, leaving a dagger at the original location. Upon arrival, deals [Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage and drains 25 MP to nearby enemies, while also inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed]; recasting the skill within 5 seconds returns to the dagger's location, dealing [Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage and draining 25 MP to nearby enemies, while also inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed].

Inflicts the enemy with a Soul Snare, dealing  [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and linking with the target,silencing both parties for 5s. During this period, the castergains [Soul Snare]. The link breaks if distance exceeds12m. [Soul Snare]Critical Rate: +30%Damage Resistance: +50%Attack Speed: +30%Cannot use skills

Thrusts in the target's direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 140%] Physical Damage and inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed].Skill's second stage can be cast within 5s: Dash towardtarget direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 225%] PhysicalDamage and inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed] to all enemieshit. Deals [Damage Rate: 450%] Physical Damage againstenemies with less than 40% HP.

Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage + True Damage equal to 10% of the target's Max HP to nearby enemies, while also inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed]. If this skill triggers Hemorrhage, recovers 10% of Max HP and gains 40%+ Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

Leaps to the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 320%] Physical Damage to enemy targets around self upon landing, while also applying 3 stacks of [Bleed] and [Healing Reduction], lasting for 4s. The target cannot be affected by Sanguine Pounce's [Healing Reduction] effect again within 8s. If this skill triggers Hemorrhage, its Cooldown is reduced to 8s. [Healing Reduction]: Cannot receive Heal.

Dashes forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] PhysicalDamage to all enemies hit, inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed],and reducing Damage Resistance by 20% for 4s.Skill's second stage can be cast within 5s:Deals [Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage to enemiesin a frontal cone, inflicts 3 stacks of [Bleed] while alsoleaping backward
